title: Regulation (EEC) No 433/72 of the Council of 29 February 1972 amending Regulation (EEC) No 766/68 laying down general rules for granting export refunds on sugar, as regards altering the basic amount of the refund between monthly fixings
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 433/72 OF THE COUNCIL  of 29 February 1972  amending Regulation (EEC) No 766/68 laying down general rules for granting export refunds on sugar, as regards altering the basic amount of the refund between monthly fixings
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 7 of Regulation (EEC) No 766/68, paragraph 4 shall be deleted and paragraph 5 shall be renumbered paragraph 4.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 February 1972.
For the Council
The President
J.P. BUCHLER  1OJ No 308, 18.12.1967, p. 1. 2OJ No L 282, 23.12.1971, p. 8. 3OJ No L 143, 25.6.1968, p. 6. 4OJ No L 114, 26.5.1971, p. 10.
